Detailed Description

Browser class.

Used for basic browser detection.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
Copyright:
2009 David Singer
Author:
David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
2.0.1
Required:
Function get_browser. Read the notes.
See also:
http://us3.php.net/function.get-browser
http://browsers.garykeith.com/downloads.asp
http://us3.php.net/manual/en/misc.configuration.php#ini.browscap

static Boo_Browser::start (  )  [static]

Starts the Boo_Browser object.

Loads self::$browser. Called from Boo_Browser::__construct().

Returns:
bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
